short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Checks whether companies in LinkedIn job postings are OPT employers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows international students studying in the USA to view companies on LinkedIn that accept Employment Authorization Cards (EAD). It highlights companies that support Optional Practical Training (OPT) by marking them as either "OPT" or "NON-OPT," helping students quickly identify relevant employers.

No user data is collected; we only retrieve company names to check against our database.

**Disclaimer:** Chrome may display a warning that this extension can "read your browsing history." This is due to our need to request permission to access browser tabs, which ensures smooth functionality on LinkedIn. However, we do not read, collect, or store your browsing history. The tab access is solely used to detect when you're on LinkedIn and to display OPT information directly on the site. We take your privacy seriously and only request the permissions necessary to deliver our service, helping international students find OPT-friendly employers.

Additionally, Chrome will not approve any extension for publication if it is deemed unsafe. Rest assured, this extension has been thoroughly reviewed and meets all security guidelines. It is completely safe to use, respecting your privacy and ensuring a secure experience.
